item.description:
Thought I'd schedule a hike here on a Saturday so those who can't make Sundays can check it out.

I've heard if you use a GPS to find the location they can flake out in this area so be aware... If you aren't sure where this is located check out the google map under "Location" above.

Here's a link to a pdf of the trails :
http://www.salemnhcon...

Here's a link for more information:
http://www.salemnhcon...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the parking area by the trail head. Dogs should probably be leashed at the beginning. Of course last time I forgot Beau's!

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Salem Town Forest
